Title: Authorizes the creation of state debt in creating the save public housing bond act of 2025 and provides for submission to the people of such proposal
Summary: Authorizes the creation of state debt in the amount of 20 billion dollars in relation to enacting the save public housing bond act of 2025; provides for submission to the people of such proposal.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the creation of a state debt in the amount of twenty billion dollars, in relation to enacting the save public housing bond act of 2025 and providing for the submission to the people of a proposition or question therefor to be voted upon at the general election to be held in November, 2025
